dcterms:description: A training set used to analyze the token imbalance phenomenon in natural language, particularly in the context of Neural Machine Translation (NMT).
dcterms:title: NIST training set

dcterms:description: The training data consists of 1.25M sentence pairs from LDC corpora which has 27.9M Chinese words and 34.5M English words.
dcterms:title: ZH-EN (Chinese-English) translation dataset

dcterms:creator: Jason Lee
Elman Mansimov
Kyunghyun Cho
dcterms:description: We used the preprocessed version of the WMT2016 English-Romanian dataset released by Lee et al. (2018) which includes 0.6M sentence pairs.
dcterms:title: WMT2016 English-Romanian dataset

dcterms:description: The training data is from WMT2016 which consists of about 4.5M sentences pairs with 118M English words and 111M German words.
dcterms:title: WMT2016 English-German dataset
